main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Cedarville, Ohio, where an oval-shaped object with a white color was observed emitting a reddish glow.
interesting points: The object changed in appearance, changed direction, and increased in size during the observation,The sighting lasted for approximately 1.5 minutes,The object was approximately 800 feet away,The evaluation categorized the sighting as Ground Visual,There was very little detailed information obtained related to the investigation.
sighted object: an oval-shaped object emitting a reddish glow
witness description: Details about the witness are redacted.
